Title: The Fall of Italy
Actors: Daniel Olbrychski, Ena Begovic, Gorica Popovic, Mirjana Karanovic
Plot: A partisan commander had to shoot one of his comrades because he had neglected the struggle and turned to a life of lust and vice. When Italy capitulates in September of 1943 and the war seems over for many Partizans, the commander follows the very same path.
